name: MONSTERS VS MACHINES
description:
PLEASE READ THIS BEFORE YOU PLAY OR YOU MIGHT BE CONFUSED

TO RESTART THE GAME RELOAD THE PAGE

WARNING MAY BE LAGGY FOR WEAK DEVICES

CONTROLS

look left: left arrow

look right: right arrow

move forward: up arrow

move backward: down arrow

shoot: space bar

reload: r key

turn 180 degrees: v key

ENERGY ABILITIES

If left bar is cyan, you can use. If not, you can't use.

Rockets: z key

Defensive: x key

DASH

If right bar is green, you can dash.

dash: c key

INFO

The colored boxes are the character selection.

ABILITIES

Z

X
